name: Black Diamond Vantastic T-Shirt - Women's
description:
Rack and roll with this Vantastic tee. Part gear shed, part transportation, part home, #vanlife teaches you to find joy in the simple things, like a really comfy t-shirt.Soft organic cotton jersey has just a hint of spandex for a comfortable stretch that holdd its shape.Slim fit provides a trim, athletic fit.
